content.prompt: Based on the data in the table, which of the following will happen if Country X and Country Y agree to specialize and trade based on their comparative advantage?

choices.label: Country X will export cars, and both countries will gain from trade if 1 car is exchanged for 3 motorcycles.
Country X will export motorcycles, and both countries will gain from trade if 1 car is exchanged for 5 motorcycles.
Country Y will export cars, and both countries will gain from trade if 1 car is exchanged for 3 motorcycles.
Country Y will export motorcycles, and both countries will gain from trade if 1 car is exchanged for 5 motorcycles.
Country Y will export motorcycles, and both countries will gain from trade if 1 car is exchanged for 7 motorcycles.

topic.text: 1.3: Comparative Advantage and Gains from Trade

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Determine the effect(s) of a change in an economic situation using quantitative data or calculations.
